overview: Luis is serial entrepreneur from Colombia. He is the co-founder of SnappyGo, the world’s largest online marketplace for travel advice. Previously Luis co-founded Mantaraya Travel, Colombia’s leading OTA, and Off Bound Adventures, a successful youth and educational travel company. Luis is a mentor at the Founder Institute and is a well-known education philanthropist in his home country. Before becoming an entrepreneur, Luis was a corporate lawyer and focused his practice in M&A’s and bankruptcy procedures in the airline industry. Luis holds a Law Degree at Universidad Javeriana, completed an exchange program in politics and economics at the University of Notre Dame and a masters at Harvard University.

video_embeds.description: TEDxYouth@GLM - Luis Enrique García - ¿Por qué no ahora?
